No Poverty.reason: The course covers "社會創新與社會企業" (Social Innovation and Social Enterprise), which are models often aimed at poverty alleviation, though it is not the primary focus.

Quality Education.reason: The course itself is an educational offering on sustainability and explicitly mentions teaching about SDGs, contributing to knowledge dissemination in this critical area.
evidence: 提供修課同學在永續創新及商業模式議題之理解

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: The course curriculum explicitly includes the topic of "減碳與綠能科技創新" (Carbon reduction and green energy technology innovation), directly addressing clean energy.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course is centered on creating "永續商業模式" (sustainable business models) and understanding "企業經營" (business operations) to foster sustainable economic value.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course title is "Sustainability, Innovation & Business Model" and focuses on "減碳科技創新" and "企業與產業的低碳轉型" (low-carbon transformation of enterprises and industries).
evidence: 企業與產業的低碳轉型

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course covers "SROI社會影響力評估方法" (SROI social impact assessment method) and "社會創新與社會企業," which are tools and models for addressing social issues.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: The course mentions building a "people-centric environment" but lacks specific focus on urban planning, housing, or community infrastructure, making the link tangential.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: A core focus is on creating "永續商業模式" (sustainable business models) and producing a "永續報告書" (sustainability report), including a "碳盤查" (carbon inventory).

Climate Action.reason: The course is heavily focused on climate action, with multiple sessions on "氣候變遷與淨零碳排" (Climate Change and Net-Zero Carbon Emission) and "碳盤查" (carbon inventory).
evidence: 氣候變遷與淨零碳排演進與趨勢
全球碳交易市 場、碳抵換、歐盟碳邊境稅

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course addresses institutional accountability through topics like "公司治理" (corporate governance) and "國際永續報告原則" (International Sustainability Reporting Principles).
evidence: 國際永續報告原則＆應用

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course is built on partnerships, explicitly stating it is in "合作" (cooperation) with an investment firm and involves an "業師" (industry mentor) and company visits.
evidence: 與樹冠影響力投資合作
由業師（樹冠投資影響力 楊家彥博士）及授課教師帶領
